mention.text: the remaining crude oil out of the tanker Exxon Valdez in preparation
the reason it took 11 hours to set the first containment line
the tanker Exxon Valdez in preparation
the Valdez , which spilled more than 10 million gallons of crude into Prince William Sound when it struck a reef March 24
The fugitive captain of the Exxon Valdez
the spill , about one-third have died
crews to be aboard ship , where drinking is prohibited , four hours before sailing
a port in the Far East
commander of the New York State Police on Long Island
The family of the fired Exxon Valdez captain
a champion of oil exploration in Alaska
